natan.name: Natan Juli√°n Mitros
natan.title: Spanish teacher
natan.bio: Hello my name is Natan and I will be happy to be your Spanish teacher. Since I was a child I have always been passionate about languages and now I would like to share this passion with you by teaching you Spanish. I have more than 3 years of experience teaching Spanish, both in individual classes and in groups. My classes are always 100% adapted to the student's needs. In my classes we never get bored and I always focus on you understanding everything we are doing.
natan.experience: 3+ years teaching Spanish to students from more than 20 different countries
natan.university: Bachelor's Degree in Modern Languages from the University of Valencia (Spain)

mili.name: Mili
mili.title: Spanish teacher
mili.bio: Hello! I'm Mili, an online Spanish tutor with more than 3 years of experience. I'm a native speaker, born in Argentina and living in Spain for many years, which gives me a broad vision of the language and its varieties. I specialize in personalized classes that adapt to each student, regardless of age: I create a warm and safe space for you to speak with confidence from day one.
mili.experience: +3 years of experience with all ages; from 5 years old to +65
mili.background: Argentina and Spain - Broad vision of the language and its varieties
